content.prompt: Which of the following contexts best explains the increase in violent conflicts in the western United States in the late 1800s?

choices.label: The increase in migration by White settlers
The regulation of industrial production by the federal government
The recognition by federal courts of labor union bargaining rights
The ban on immigration from eastern Asia

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
